summary: This list outlines five advanced knowledge graph technologies and applications that represent cutting-edge developments in the field, including neural-symbolic approaches, temporal and multimodal knowledge graphs, federated knowledge graphs, and explainable AI.
key_points: Neural-symbolic approaches integrate knowledge graphs with deep learning for enhanced capabilities
Temporal knowledge graphs capture how information changes over time
Multimodal and federated knowledge graphs expand beyond text and distribute knowledge across sources
Knowledge graphs are being used to provide transparency in AI reasoning
These technologies represent emerging trends in knowledge representation and AI
